ygData.subject: Re: Bard's 47th lvl song.
ygData.msgSnippet: Translation from http://babelfish.altavista.digital.com/cgi-bin/translate? PATCH - SPELLUPDATES. 20,04 o clock MET. Vlad the following modifications with the
ygData.messageBody:
Translation from http://babelfish.altavista.digital.com/cgi-bin/translate?

PATCH - SPELLUPDATES. 20,04 o'clock MET. Vlad the following modifications
with the Spells gabs in this Patch: (are already entered in the data base,
which becomes klassenabhaenigen lists as soon as possible updated. Give us
nevertheless please a feedback whether such information in the future want
to see it here. Who would not like such Spoilor, please do not read on!)
Summon Corpse: AGAIN! Level 39 Necromancer Spell Niv's Melody OF
Preservation: AGAIN! Level 47 Bard Song Shield OF lava: the Durationbonus
increases Screaming terror: Manakosten around 30 reduced, stops now 5
seconds (1 tick) more briefly, effect Entrall Psalm OF Mystic Shielding:
here an indefinite effect was added Alenia's Disenchanting Melody:
Durationbonus set to 0

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: Christopher Olcott <chrisamy@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 05, 1999 2:00 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard's 47th lvl song.


> Here's a tidbit I found on the necromancer's board... there they were
talking about the Summon Corpse spell which is being tested on the test
server. . . someone threw this out from some German gaming site. Anyone on
the list feel like translating? One part in particular though seems
straight forward enough:
>
> Niv's Melody of Preservation: NEU! Level 47 Bard Song
>
>
> Now the question. . . just what does it do? =)
>
> PATCH - SPELLUPDATES . 20.04 Uhr MET . Vlad

> (Sind schon in der Datenbank eingetragen, die klassenabh´┐¢nigen
Listen werden baldm´┐¢glichst
> aktualisiert.
> Gebt uns doch bitte ein Feedback, ob ihr derartige Informationen in
Zukunft hier sehen wollt.
> Wer keine derartigen Spoilor m´┐¢chte, bitte nicht weiterlesen!)
> Summon Corpse: NEU! Level 39 Necromancer Spell
> Niv's Melody of Preservation: NEU! Level 47 Bard Song
> Shield of Lava: der Durationbonus wurde erh´┐¢ht
> Screaming Terror: Manakosten um 30 reduziert, h´┐¢lt nun 5 Sekunden (1
Tick) k´┐¢rzer an, Effekt Entrall
> Psalm of Mystic Shielding: hier wurde ein unbestimmter Effekt
hinzugef´┐¢gt
> Alenia's Disenchanting Melody: Durationbonus auf 0 gesetzt
>
>
> The link to where I found this (the necromancer's board, not the german
site):
> http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/general/3257.html
>
>
> Kassao, 31st half elf bard
